article_metadata.description: Franklin Roosevelt arrives in San Francisco, just before the 1932 election, to deliver a speech on the need for Big Government to guide the economy. No President in American history, outside of a major war, has extended the tentacles of the federal government as has Barack Obama. He has learned what [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes
